title: Texting Tutor PT 1: Is Her Stepdaughter's Mother Being Petty About This Situation?
description:
You’re conflicted. But you just don’t KNOW how to approach your problem…especially if you’re not a confrontational person. So sometimes, you just need a little help addressing the situation – and that’s where we come in!
We’ll tell you what to text the person, line by line, and we’ll help you resolve the problem…but you have to PROMISE to write EXACTLY what we tell you to.
Jennifer has a great relationship with her stepdaughter, and she wants to bond with her over some back-to-school shopping. But first, she wants to clear this with her stepdaughter's birth mom. Will she let her take her shopping?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
